actors.name: Borrower
actors.summary: Users who create and manage CDPs to borrow DFID.

actions.name: Open Safe
actions.summary: Opens a new Safe with a specified ID and collateral amount.

actions.name: Close Safe
actions.summary: Closes an existing Safe, identified by its ID.

actions.name: Borrow
actions.summary: Borrows a specified amount against a Safe.

actions.name: Repay
actions.summary: Repays a portion of the debt associated with a Safe.

actions.name: Add Collateral
actions.summary: Adds collateral to an existing Safe.

actions.name: Withdraw Collateral
actions.summary: Withdraws collateral from an existing Safe.

actions.name: Fee Topup
actions.summary: Tops up the fees associated with a Safe.

actors.name: Redeemer
actors.summary: Users who redeem DFID for collateral to maintain the peg.

actions.name: Redeem
actions.summary: Redeems a specified amount of the stablecoin.

actors.name: Liquidator
actors.summary: Users or bots that liquidate undercollateralized Safes.

actions.name: Liquidate
actions.summary: Initiates the liquidation process.

actions.name: Liquidate Safe
actions.summary: Liquidates a specific Safe.

actions.name: Perform Liquidation
actions.summary: Performs a liquidation.

actions.name: Is Liquidation Possible
actions.summary: Checks if a liquidation is possible.

actors.name: Stability Provider
actors.summary: Users who stake tokens in the Stability Pool to earn rewards and participate in liquidations.

actions.name: Stake
actions.summary: Stakes tokens in the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Unstake
actions.summary: Unstakes tokens from the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Claim Rewards
actions.summary: Claims rewards from the Stability Pool.

actors.name: DFIRE Staker
actors.summary: Users who stake DFIRE tokens to earn a portion of protocol fees.

actions.name: Stake
actions.summary: Stakes DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Unstake
actions.summary: Unstakes DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Claim Rewards
actions.summary: Claims rewards from DFIRE staking.

actors.name: Protocol Owner
actors.summary: The owner of the contracts, responsible for administrative tasks.

actions.name: Mint DFIRE
actions.summary: Mints new DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFIRE
actions.summary: Burns DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Mint DFID
actions.summary: Mints new DFID tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFID
actions.summary: Burns DFID tokens.

actions.name: Add Reward
actions.summary: Adds reward tokens to the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Add Collateral Reward
actions.summary: Adds collateral reward to the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Add Reward
actions.summary: Adds reward tokens to DFIRE staking.

actions.name: Add Collateral Reward
actions.summary: Adds collateral reward tokens to DFIRE staking.

actions.name: Set Stability Pool Rewards
actions.summary: Sets whether the stability pool can receive rewards.

actions.name: Set SBR Staking Pool Rewards
actions.summary: Sets whether the SBR staking pool can receive rewards.

actors.name: Price Oracle (Chainlink)
actors.summary: Provides the price feed for ETH, crucial for collateralization ratios and liquidations.

actions.name: Fetch Price
actions.summary: Fetches the latest price of ETH.

actions.name: Last Good Price
actions.summary: Retrieves the last known good price of ETH.
